channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hugely Overgrown bushes in Alley, 7th June
item.description:
In alleyway running from Alma Road to Hatherly Road section nearest Alma Road is very overgrown walked through whilst raining the other day and my jeans where soaked through all the way from having to wade through overgrown bushes and nettles. Been an issue for a couple of months now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Alma Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge damaged, 6th June
item.description:
Bridge damage I reported on 14th May still not repaired & public have moved cones & sign closing the footpath. I had received an email saying this had been repaired, but that is clearly not the case.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gevum Way, Gloucester

item.title: Deep pothole in the pavement.. surrounded by fencing, 6th June
item.description:
Between 24 and 26 Albert Place, Pittville, Cheltenham. It’s been fenced off for weeks and I would like to know when it will be properly fixed. My house no.26 need to be marketed to be sold and I’m concerned that the fencing and pothole might impact the selling price potential.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Albert Place, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
